item.title: Cheryl Hines Questions If “The View” Hosts Read Her Book Before Awkward Interview: They 'Just Wanted to Grill Me' About RFK Jr.
item.description: Hines was "hoping" her Oct. 14 appearance on the talk show would be "more personal" rather than so focused on her husband's politics

item.title: Prince Harry Reveals What He and Meghan Markle Will Do When Prince Archie, 6, and Princess Lilibet, 4, Want Phones
item.description: The Duke of Sussex spoke about the issue shortly after his brother, Prince William, shared that none of his three children have phones

item.title: Trump Admits U.S. Constitution Bars Him from Running for Third Term: ‘If You Read It, It's Pretty Clear'
